heading: This Afternoon
text: Partly cloudy, mostly cloudy in the northern mountains, with the chance of a flurry or sprinkle there. Highs from the mid 40s to lower 50s north, low to mid 50s in the south. West to northwest winds 10 to 20 mph, gusting to 40 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clearing early, except clouds decreasing slowly in the northern mountains, then clouds increasing all areas late. Lows from the mid 30s to around 40, except upper 20s to lower 30s northeast. Northwest winds 10 to 15 mph, gusting to 25 mph early, then diminishing.

heading: Wednesday
text: Mostly cloudy. Scattered rain or mountain snow showers near and north of Route 2, spreading south to around Route 4 mid to late afternoon. Highs from the mid 40s to around 50 north, and upper 40s to mid 50s in the south. South to southwest winds 5 to 10 mph.
